title: Promoting Climate Smart Agricultural Initiatives in Cambodia

tasks.task: Farmers responding to climate change in Cambodia through agricultural projects
subtasks: Rehabilitating and climate-proofing irrigation systems
Implementing laser land leveling to improve water conservation
Testing weather-indexed crop insurance for rice farmers
Developing a certification system for more resilient rice seeds
Creating employment opportunities for women in rice farming

tasks.task: Government support for climate resilience in agriculture
subtasks: Preparing strategic programs for climate resilience
Implementing seven investment projects for comprehensive support
Specific focus on the agricultural sector through two investment projects

tasks.task: Economic, social, and environmental sustainability in rice farming
subtasks: Enhancing rice production in major provinces
Improving irrigation water use efficiency
Supporting farmers to manage climate risks
Ensuring availability and quality of certified rice seeds
Promoting gender equality through job creation for women
